scripts.docker:image: docker images | grep bee4ts || docker build -t bee4ts ./
scripts.docker:TAREFA1: npm run docker:image && docker run -v ./:/usr/src bee4ts npm run TAREFA1
scripts.docker:TAREFA2: npm run docker:image && docker run -v ./:/usr/src bee4ts npm run TAREFA2
scripts.docker:TAREFA3: npm run docker:image && docker run -v ./:/usr/src bee4ts npm run TAREFA3
